name: You must leave it behind (Team 2)
description:
Controls

WASD - Movement

F - Activates Spirit Form

Right Click - Aims with Sniper

Left Click - Shoots Gun

E - Interact

Objective - Infiltrate the mob hideout and kill the boss, he tends to pace around a lot so look out for that, once you've taken him out head back to the entrance for extraction.

There are a couple major issues such as:

- Once some enemies die they can cause all the Enemies and buttons to reset to 0,0,0 thus making the game unplayable if you haven't progressed far enough, luckily this was kind of fixed and should only happen late into the mission.

-The spirit becoming solid and blocking the player.

Most issues appeared  once we put in the final map which was the final day so there was a rush to get things fixed so unfortunately it wasn't all ironed out in time but is playable from start to finish.
